snippet: The victim was Liberian who had worked for the United Nations peacekeeping mission in her country.
abstract: United Nations loses its first staff member from what is called a 'probable' case of Ebola in Liberia; death comes as the United Nations is increasing its efforts to contain the Ebola outbreak in West Africa, including by sending specialists to the region.
lead_paragraph: The victim was Liberian who had worked for the United Nations peacekeeping mission in her country.

headline.main: Ebola Suspected in U.N. Worker’s Death
